solution_line_template: The first pair of weights weighs {first_pair_weight_each} lb each so all total they weigh {num_in_pair}*{first_pair_weight_each} = <<{first_pair_weight_each}*{num_in_pair}={first_pair_total_weight}>>{first_pair_total_weight} lbs

The second pair of weights weigh {second_pair_weight_each} lbs each so they weigh {num_in_pair}*{second_pair_weight_each} = <<{second_pair_weight_each}*{num_in_pair}={second_pair_total_weight}>>{second_pair_total_weight} lbs

The third pair of weights weigh {third_pair_weight_each} lbs each so they weigh {num_in_pair}*{third_pair_weight_each} = <<{third_pair_weight_each}*{num_in_pair}={third_pair_total_weight}>>{third_pair_total_weight}lbs

All total, the entire system of weights weigh {first_pair_total_weight}+{second_pair_total_weight}+{third_pair_total_weight} = <<{first_pair_total_weight}+{second_pair_total_weight}+{third_pair_total_weight}={total_system_weight}>>{total_system_weight} lbs
